description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              -	Quantity : 20
              
              -	Location : Hà Nội, HCM
              
              -	Position type	: Full time
              

              •	Web developer for Healthcare System (Payment,  etc...).
              
              •	Discussing/suggesting to clients about requirement/system design, good UI/UX.
              
              •	Researching new technology & sharing your knowledge.
              
              •	Planning and suggesting your ideas to project team.
              
              •	Work with project manager in coordinating and communicating content change requests and production schedule.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	1+ years of experience in designing and developing large-scale web-based applications.
              
              •	Strong background development with PHP based MVC framework, specifically CodeIgniter
              
              •	Strong experience with data modeling, relational database, SQL and database administration and complex queries. Specifically, experience utilizing MySQL and MongoDB.
              
              •	Strong with web technologies such as JavaScript (AJAX, jQuery) and PHP, AngularJS
              
              •	Strong experience with Git
              
              •	Knowledge in JIRA a plus
              
              •	Knowledge in networking (basic), Web server (Apache, NGINX), Linux server
              
              •	Experience using KendoUI or equivalent a plus
              
              •	Experience working in an OS X environment a plus.
              
              •	Proven ability to excel in a fast-paced, dynamic development environment
              
              •	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
              
              •	Excellent multi-tasking and organizational skills
              

              Benefit:
              
              •	Successful candidates will be offered a friendly, motivated working environment;
              
              •	Get involve in major full-cycle project with large scale and opportunities to work directly with specialists and experts in system designing in Japanese top corporations in producing medical services.
              
              •	Challenging position with high chances for promotion
              
              •	Very attractive salary;
              
              •	“FPT care” health insurance provided by AON and is exclusive for FPT employees.
              
              •	Company shuttle buses provide convenient way of transportation for all employees.
              
              •	F-Town Campus provides many facilities for FPT Software employees such as football ground, basketball & volleyball, gym center, cafeteria, etc.
              

              Contact Person:
              
              Interested candidates should submit a completed Curriculum Vitae/ Résume and Cover Letter (if any) to:
              
              Resource Assurance Incubation Center, FPT Software Hochiminh Co.Ltd
              
              Contact Person: Ms. Bui Thi Thu Thoa
              
              Website	: www.career.fpt-software.com
              

              *** FPT Software – Where talents meet ***
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
